Ann to Johnny Brazeau - Children living, one, Flora - Children deceased, one, James - Scrip for $240 - Claim 939; Date: 1885-1906; Context of this record: Department of the Interior fonds / Dominion Lands Branch / North-West Territories Métis scrip applications; Date(s): 1885-1906; Place of creation: Canada; Language of material: English; Finding aid no.: 15-20; General note: Scrip was a certificate issued by the Department of the Interior which indicated the right of the holder to receive payment later in the form of money or land.
